title: Did The Right Team Win The East?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and The Ringer's Kevin Clark debate if it feels like the right team won the Eastern Conference and if the Heat should run it back with the same roster next season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Did the Right Team Win The Eastern Conference This Year?
